a.xlink:title: Prepare the hardware for idling: stop acquisition and enable analog output hardware.
Idling between scans, setting the analog output value if requested.
Prepare a scan, we initialize the internal buffers and status variables.

Prepare a specific scan step. We first check if we have already run all requested steps, in which cas we go back to preparing idling. Otherwise, we initialize the instruments, and move the scanner to its first position.
Wait a bit for the laser to reach its first value.
Actual data recording. We collect the available data. When all data have been collected, we go back to preparing a step.
Prepare the hardware for idling: stop acquisition and enable analog output hardware.
Idling between scans, setting the analog output value if requested.
Prepare a scan, we initialize the internal buffers and status variables.

Prepare a specific scan step. We first check if we have already run all requested steps, in which cas we go back to preparing idling. Otherwise, we initialize the instruments, and move the scanner to its first position.
Wait a bit for the laser to reach its first value.
Actual data recording. We collect the available data. When all data have been collected, we go back to preparing a step.
